title: All Signs Point to Falling Rates as Downturn Looms
text:
We got three notable economic developments between Tuesday evening and Wednesday afternoon, with each signalling in different directions: the Federal Reserve's expanded balance sheet, the Labor Department's Job Openings and Labor Turnover survey, and the minutes from the Fed's September meeting. Yet, the ultimate result of these is clear: Interest...
